items.title: LeBron James recorded a special message for the Indians after their record-setting 21st straight win
items.summary: LeBron records a message for the Indians
items.content: And he wants them to win 40 in a row.

items.title: Tribe rarely challenged during winning streak
items.summary: You might have heard that Cleveland has won 21 games in a row. This is amazing enough -- it's a mathematical wonder, really. What's crazier is that Cleveland is actually playing better than their winning streak.
items.content: You might have heard that Cleveland has won 21 games in a row. This is amazing enough -- it's a mathematical wonder, really. What's crazier is that Cleveland is actually playing better than their winning streak.

alternate.title: Tribe rarely challenged during winning streak

items.title: Price, Sox set to discuss his role upon return
items.summary: The Red Sox will sit down with lefty David Price on Thursday to determine what role he can fill upon his return to action, which could be soon. Price threw three simulated innings at Fenway Park prior to Wednesday's game against the Athletics and is eager to start pitching again in real games.
items.content: The Red Sox will sit down with lefty David Price on Thursday to determine what role he can fill upon his return to action, which could be soon. Price threw three simulated innings at Fenway Park prior to Wednesday's game against the Athletics and is eager to start pitching again in real games.

alternate.title: Price, Sox set to discuss his role upon return

items.title: Royals 'pen has bite despite needing rest
items.summary: What the Royals really needed with a depleted bullpen on Wednesday was some length from starter Eric Skoglund. They didn't get it, as Skoglund went just three innings.
items.content: What the Royals really needed with a depleted bullpen on Wednesday was some length from starter Eric Skoglund. They didn't get it, as Skoglund went just three innings.

alternate.title: Royals 'pen has bite despite needing rest
